    Package Description
    ch.obermuhlner.math.big  

    • Uses of BigComplex in ch.obermuhlner.math.big

      Fields in ch.obermuhlner.math.big declared as BigComplex 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static BigComplex BigComplex.I
      Imaginary 1 represented as complex number.
      static BigComplex BigComplex.ONE
      Real 1 represented as complex number.
      static BigComplex BigComplex.ZERO
      Zero represented as complex number.
